text: I would like to automatically move emails from a specific email address to the trash folder. Is there a solution for this?

Hey Guys
Would anyone be able to help me out with this? I have an app developer account and everywhere I am seeing this message "This action requires elevated permissions."
I am unable to figure out how to solve it.
Are you a super admin?
Heo guys I would like to automatically move emails from a specific email address to the trash folder. Is there a solution for this?

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!
Yes I am
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C019VT42R8X/p1681901074602199>
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C019VT42R8X/p1681901074602199>
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1681883218158479>
Yep that's definitely possible
This is a good question, I definitely don't know the answer but would also like to know if this is automatic
I mean you could turn off HubSpot automatic tracking and then manually place it in the website header or footer (using settings)
You deleted your HubSpot account and it's still sending data?
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CBA9UA4EN/p1681837967295669>
Yeah so those come from public HubSpot apps, you can create one through a developer account and then use that information for authentication with power automate
Here's a quick video on this: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j64kqwCvXWI>

Hey Carter! Thanks for the response. I figured out a way to use a postman collection that's setup for Bearer token auth, and make that compatible with the API Key verification method in Power Automate
oh awesome
Can you share a little more detail about the problem you're running into?
Possibly a screenshot?

I can follow back up later and let you know how we accomplished it, if you're interested.

(chose to go with private app instead of public app, so we're using the access token)
(just figured it out yesterday lol)

Unfortunately currently no, but you could do it the other way around, have another identify system work in HubSpot. <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/set-up-single-sign-on-sso-to-access-private-content>
Oh I know how to do it, but thought you really wanted to go down the oauth 2 route
Really appreciate it though

I'd love to ask you some follow up questions regarding going down the oauth 2 route though. I struggled for days trying to figure out how to input the correct parameters and URLs from HubSpot into Power Automate.
of course happy to answer any questions
Awesome, thanks, will follow-up with them in this thread. I appreciate it
(although if this is just for a single HubSpot portal it's usually best to go with a private app)
Right now it is just for a single portal but it's possible that it could go on the marketplace at some point
Definitely will want to go down the oauth 2 route then if you want to go down the marketplace route

Thanks for the suggestion. I don't see that setting to "turn off HubSpot automatic tracking" available in this account. where is it located? If I had access to that, I could manually place it in the website header or footer

I seem to be having the same issue as this person describes: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Reporting-Analytics/Block-automatic-HubSpot-tracking/td-p/670254>

But adding the "doNotTrack" is not an acceptable solution for this client

Hi everyone, we have a question regarding HubSpot CMS grids:

• From all the public documentation, we see that the grid specs are a *1170 grid* which is a bit narrow (1200 width)
• Is it possible to go wider than this grid for us to design and customize layouts on HubSpot CMS? Or is the 1170 grid below the only option? 
Thank you in advance!
Yes, if you know what you're doing, you can match any max-width spec within HubSpot CMS

I can’t seem to create a child theme of the parent theme in design manager. It seems like there’s an instance of the parent theme already but i can’t delete it either. Does anyone know how to solve this ?
Hi everyone! Has a question about using an embed code for a virtual map on an HS landing page. Thanks in Advance!
What's the question?

Wow..that would be helpful. LOL Is there a way to do to add an embed code on a landing page? We are a home builder and use interactive maps for our communities and it would be ideal to place this within the page. It didn't seem there was a module to add this.
Unfortunately my account has been deactivated due to inactivity and the API continues to send interventions to my Google ADS companions.
